definitions.definition: To suffer violent involuntary contractions of the muscles, causing one's body to contort .
To be beset by political or social upheaval .
To cause (someone) to suffer such contractions, especially as a result of making them laugh heartily.

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To suffer violent involuntary contractions of the muscles, causing one's body to contort .
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive , figurative ) To be beset by political or social upheaval .
( transitive ) To cause (someone) to suffer such contractions, especially as a result of making them laugh heartily.
